writer.name: 多鲁·尼采斯库 Doru Niţescu

director.name: 多鲁·尼采斯库 Doru Niţescu

introduction: 一位老人捡到一个包裹， 不曾想到里面装的是一个婴儿……他试图转移这个包袱，整个公寓的人都这么想，这个包裹在公寓里开始了奇异的旅行……观看地址：https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T8tCg-eMAu8Winner of Sound and popular fifth edition of the International Festival of Student Film "CineMaIubit".Organizers Prize and a Special Mention at the International Festival in Milan 2001.Winner of Best Director of a film student at the International Experimental Film in Madrid.Participant preselection Oscars 2001 was among the last 24 selected films.
